description: Returns the most current information about the signaling channel. You must specify either the name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the channel that you want to describe.

nested_items.name: ChannelInfo
nested_items.description: A structure that encapsulates the specified signaling channel's metadata and properties.

nested_items.name: ChannelName
nested_items.description: The name of the signaling channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the signaling channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelType
nested_items.description: The type of the signaling channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelStatus
nested_items.description: Current status of the signaling channel.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the signaling channel was created.

nested_items.name: SingleMasterConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the configuration for the SINGLE_MASTER channel type.

nested_items.name: MessageTtlSeconds
nested_items.description: The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the signaling channel.
